snippet.title: Why Do Leaves Change Color?
snippet.description: Most children have jumped into piles of leaves or helped their parents rake the yard, and everyone has wondered: Why do leaves change color?

snippet.title: After the Leaves Fall
snippet.description: Julia DeSmit can't wait for her life to begin.

snippet.title: Leaves Fall Down: Learning about Autumn Leaves
snippet.description: Provides a simple introduction to the scientific principles that explain why the leaves of some trees change color in the autumn and then fall from the trees.

snippet.title: Fall Leaves Fall!
snippet.description: What's the best part of fall? Fall leaves! Red leaves, yellow leaves, leaves for crunching, leaves for jumping.

snippet.title: Seasons: Why Do Leaves Fall?
snippet.description: Introduces young readers to the four seasons.

snippet.title: Why Do Leaves Change Color?
snippet.description: Provides answers to such questions about trees as "How do trees grow?", "How do trees change with the season?", and "How do leaves make food for the tree?"

snippet.title: The Monthly Review - Page 490
snippet.description: Why do the leaves fall in autumn ? Why does our hair fall off in old age ? Why do old trees appear furrowed with cracks, and the skin of aged persons dry, withered, and wrinkled ? These are questions, which we conceive to be of considerable ...
